definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Note that bleaching is a permanent color change that is not reversible.
sentences.chinese: 要注意的是，漂白劑具有永久性。

sentences.english: Come , Dowsed in mud , Soaked in bleach.
sentences.chinese: 來，到糟粕裏尋寶，在漂白劑裏浸禮。

sentences.english: He bleached the stains out of the jacket.
sentences.chinese: 他用漂白劑把茄克上的污漬除掉。

sentences.english: For blends and colors, use an oxygen bleach.
sentences.chinese: 對混紡和有色衣服，應使用氧漂白劑。

sentences.english: Clean up spilled medicines, bleaches, gasoline, or other flammable liquids immediately.
sentences.chinese: 立即清理撒落的藥品，漂白劑，汽油，或其他易燃品。

sentences.english: Only bleach seemed able to destroy it.
sentences.chinese: 似乎只有漂白劑能破壞它。

sentences.english: Rinsed chlorine bleach bottles work well for water storage.
sentences.chinese: 用含氯漂白劑清洗過的瓶子用來儲存食水效果最好。

sentences.english: Bleach keeps the white clothes from yellowing.
sentences.chinese: 漂白劑防止白衣服變黃。

sentences.english: Use it as a tooth whitener.
sentences.chinese: 可以用來做牙齒漂白劑。

sentences.english: Dingy whites can be brought back to their crisp, white best without the use of bleach.
sentences.chinese: 漂白劑可能會使牀單變脆，最好不用它。

sentences.english: Espree Bright White Shampoo whitens and brightens without the use of bleach and harsh chemicals.
sentences.chinese: 愛斯亮白洗毛水不含漂白劑和其它剌激的代學品。

sentences.english: You should always use chlorine bleach for white clothes.
sentences.chinese: 白色衣服應該總是使用氯漂白劑來洗。

sentences.english: Another way to disinfect them is in a freshly made solution of chlorine bleach.
sentences.chinese: 另一個消毒的方法是使用含氯的漂白劑。

sentences.english: Pulp The mixture of fibre, water, bleaches and fillers from which paper is made.
sentences.chinese: 由纖維，水，漂白劑和填料混合而成的造紙材料。

sentences.english: Unlike bleaches, they don't change the color of teeth.
sentences.chinese: 不同於漂白劑，它們並不改變顏色的牙齒。
